column1: - all lines starting with a dash '-' are comments
- if previous year finalised and previous is voluntary then can opt-out from previous year
-if current year is voluntary then can opt-out from current year
- if next year is voluntary then can opt-out from next year
-if current year is voluntary and next year is unknown then can opt-out from next year
- only the first four values of the rule are used as the regex expression
- a dot in '.' will match any value
- NO = No opt-out can be offered
